segments.advisor_message: So, just to recap, you mentioned that you're looking to save for your kids' education and also maybe buy a new house in the next few years, right?
segments.client_message: Yeah, that’s right! I really want to make sure they can go to a good college, and we’ve been thinking about getting a bigger place too.

segments.advisor_message: Got it! And you also said that you're worried about retirement savings, correct? You want to make sure you're set for that?
segments.client_message: Exactly! I’m just not sure if we’re doing enough right now to save for retirement, you know? It kinda stresses me out sometimes.

segments.advisor_message: Okay, so it's about education funding, a new house, and retirement savings. We’ll definitely work on strategies for all of them. Is there anything else you thought of?
segments.client_message: No, I think that covers it. Just want to make sure we’re on the right path!
